thread.title: Children's Medical Research Institute - Dana
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Children's Medical Research Institute - Dana

author: Children's Medical Research Institute - Dana
title: Children's Medical Research Institute - Dana
text:
Allister at Flashbay made ordering new USBs a seamless, easy and fuss-free experience. So much so that I have already used them twice and have no hesitation in using again! Communication was always prompt, clear and nothing was an issue - even when I made last minute changes.
The quality of the print on the USBs is amazing and the team are very happy that it helps them present the brand in its best light.
